# deviceUsages

**Instance Property**

A list of usages supported by the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var deviceUsages: [HIDUsage]?
```

## Discussion

For more details, see [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDUsage].
